timeline.message:
NF: move a if in SQL

This ensure we need to get less data from the database, letting it do some work
NF: avoid multiple conversions to Long

timeline.bodyText: Was this one necessary, or missed?
timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: mid is used only once, and it is used as a long. So in this case, we need long
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior
